mapper.select:
select crewboard_num, cb.large, cb.small, cb.state, cb.crew_name, cb.subject, cb.writer, cb.contents, cb.reg_date, cb.readcount, crew.crew_limit, crew.crew_now, (select count(*) from crew_comments where idx = cb.crewboard_num and delete_yn = 'N') as comments from crew_board cb inner join crew on cb.crew_name = crew.crew_name
where contents like #{keyword} or subject like #{keyword}
where cb.crew_name like #{keyword}
where cb.small = 'M' and cb.crew_name like #{keyword}
where cb.small = 'P' and cb.crew_name like #{keyword}
where cb.large = 1 and cb.small = 'M'
where cb.large = 2 and cb.small = 'M'
where cb.large = 1 and cb.small = 'P'
where cb.large = 2 and cb.small = 'P'
where cb.state = 0
where cb.state = 1
order by reg_date desc
order by readcount desc
order by comments desc
mapper.insert: insert into crew_board(crewboard_num, state, large, small, crew_name, subject, writer, contents, reg_date, readcount) values(crewbrd_seq.nextval, 0, #{large}, #{small}, #{crewname}, #{subject}, #{writer}, #{contents}, sysdate, 0)
